desc: At GT’s, we are stewards of Nature—the world’s greatest healer and our divine source of inspiration. We cultivate our offerings with whole raw ingredients and traditional practices, so that we can offer them to you in their purest, most potent forms.

layout.text: It’s here for a limited time!

Our smooth summer edition celebrates the sounds that unite us. A harmonious blend of tart cherry, silky sweet coconut, and bright lemongrass.

Collect all 5 U-N-I-T-Y Caps from our SYNERGY Raw Kombucha bottles to enter the sweepstakes. 50 grand prize winners will score tickets to the hottest concert this summer.
